document_data.mainbody:
or Kulenov was a wizard working for King Gareth Dragonsbane of Damara.
Master Kulenov was a pudgy, little man with a billy-goat beard.
While in the Plane of Shadow, Mor Kulenov cast Nybors wrathful castigation on a shadow dragon, and with a different spell, he made his staff and beard shimmer the latter shimmered longer, suggesting he was casting silverbeard.
Master Kulenov was the one who allowed Sergor Marsk and his traitors into the Kings retinue on Mirtul 3 in the . He was present there too, and attempted to rouse the King after he was cursed, but failed. He was later part of the incursion into the Plane of Shadow to recover the Kings soul on Kythorn 26.
